import { Container, Image, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; export const About = () => { return (

About Myself

Hello! My name is Juliana, and I live in Ontario, Canada. I am looking for innovation, new opportunities, and challenging projects. My family and settling in Canada were the most successful plans of my life.

My interest in technology is present since childhood. I have accumulated over than ten years of experience as a software engineer, having a large knowledge in business analysis, and skills such as detail-oriented and leadership.

My father was my greatest inspiration source. I naturally felt that I appreciate helping and dedicating myself to people.

"Leaders must inspire and motivate to raise new leaders."

Juliana
); }
